name: Souls Please
description:
-- Sometimes Crashes in Chrome, works fine on Firefox and  if downloaded --

There seems to have been a terrible error! You have died but have led a perfectly neutral life. This means we cannot accurately judge and sort you into the appropriate after life. Instead of sending you straight to the bad place, the big guy has decided to give you a job to earn your way to the good place! You must make your way through our backlog of unsorted souls and determine their fate.
